mapper.select: select * from QUERY order by QUERYSEQ
select * from QUERY where CUSID=#{cusId} order by QUERYSEQ
mapper.insert: insert into QUERY (queryseq, open, prodid, cusid, title, content, reply) values(queryseq.nextval, #{open}, #{prodId}, #{cusId}, #{title}, #{content}, null)
mapper.update: update QUERY set OPEN=#{open}, TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content} where QUERYSEQ=#{querySeq}
